sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 8 cm and a height of 6 cm. What is the area of the parallelogram in square centimeters?
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be calculated using the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 8 cm and the height is 6 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 8 cm × 6 cm = 48 square centimeters
